AddClusterIntoServiceMesh.title: AddClusterIntoServiceMesh
AddClusterIntoServiceMesh.summary: Adds a cluster to an ASM instance.

AddVMIntoServiceMesh.title: AddVMIntoServiceMesh
AddVMIntoServiceMesh.summary: Adds a virtual machine (VM) to a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

CreateGatewaySecret.title: CreateGatewaySecret
CreateGatewaySecret.summary: Creates a secret for a Service Mesh (ASM) gateway.

CreateIstioGatewayDomains.title: CreateIstioGatewayDomains
CreateIstioGatewayDomains.summary: Adds domain names for a Service Mesh (ASM) gateway.

CreateIstioGatewayRoutes.title: CreateIstioGatewayRoutes
CreateIstioGatewayRoutes.summary: Creates a routing rule for a Service Mesh (ASM) gateway.

DeleteGatewayRoute.title: DeleteGatewayRoute
DeleteGatewayRoute.summary: Deletes a routing rule for a Service Mesh (ASM) gateway.

DeleteGatewaySecret.title: DeleteGatewaySecret
DeleteGatewaySecret.summary: Deletes a secret for a Service Mesh (ASM) gateway.

DeleteIstioGatewayDomains.title: DeleteIstioGatewayDomains
DeleteIstioGatewayDomains.summary: Deletes one or more domain names for a Service Mesh (ASM) gateway.

DeleteSwimLaneGroup.title: DeleteSwimLaneGroup
DeleteSwimLaneGroup.summary: Deletes a lane group. If a lane group is deleted, the lanes in the group and the traffic routing rules attached to the lanes are deleted.

DescribeASMGatewayImportedServices.title: DescribeASMGatewayImportedServices
DescribeASMGatewayImportedServices.summary: Queries the information about imported services on a Service Mesh (ASM) gateway.

DescribeCCMVersion.title: DescribeCCMVersion
DescribeCCMVersion.summary: Queries the versions of the Cloud Controller Manager (CCM) component.

DescribeCens.title: DescribeCens
DescribeCens.summary: Queries the network connectivity between clusters that are deployed across virtual private clouds (VPCs) in a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

DescribeClusterGrafana.title: DescribeClusterGrafana
DescribeClusterGrafana.summary: Queries the information about Grafana dashboards of a cluster in a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

DescribeClusterPrometheus.title: DescribeClusterPrometheus
DescribeClusterPrometheus.summary: Queries the public endpoint of the Prometheus service that is used to monitor a cluster in an Alibaba Cloud Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

DescribeClustersInServiceMesh.title: DescribeClustersInServiceMesh
DescribeClustersInServiceMesh.summary: Queries the information about clusters in a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

DescribeCrTemplates.title: DescribeCrTemplates
DescribeCrTemplates.summary: Queries the common YAML templates of Istio resources used by Service Mesh (ASM) instances.

DescribeGatewaySecretDetails.title: DescribeGatewaySecretDetails
DescribeGatewaySecretDetails.summary: Queries the detailed information about a secret of a Service Mesh (ASM) gateway.

DescribeGuestClusterAccessLogDashboards.title: DescribeGuestClusterAccessLogDashboards
DescribeGuestClusterAccessLogDashboards.summary: Queries the access log dashboards of a cluster on the data plane.

DescribeGuestClusterNamespaces.title: DescribeGuestClusterNamespaces
DescribeGuestClusterNamespaces.summary: Queries a list of the namespaces of a Kubernetes cluster that is added to a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

DescribeGuestClusterPods.title: DescribeGuestClusterPods
DescribeGuestClusterPods.summary: Queries a list of the pods in a specified namespace of a Kubernetes cluster that is added to a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

DescribeImportedServicesDetail.title: DescribeImportedServicesDetail
DescribeImportedServicesDetail.summary: Queries the details of the imported services on a Service Mesh (ASM) gateway.

DescribeIstioGatewayDomains.title: DescribeIstioGatewayDomains
DescribeIstioGatewayDomains.summary: Queries a list of the domain names that are exposed by a Service Mesh (ASM) gateway.

DescribeIstioGatewayRouteDetail.title: DescribeIstioGatewayRouteDetail
DescribeIstioGatewayRouteDetail.summary: Queries the detailed information about a routing rule of an Alibaba Cloud Service Mesh (ASM) gateway.

DescribeIstioGatewayRoutes.title: DescribeIstioGatewayRoutes
DescribeIstioGatewayRoutes.summary: Queries the routing rules for a Service Mesh (ASM) gateway.

DescribeMeshMultiClusterNetwork.title: DescribeMeshMultiClusterNetwork
DescribeMeshMultiClusterNetwork.summary: Queries the network configuration descriptions of multiple Kubernetes clusters in a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

DescribeMetadata.title: DescribeMetadata
DescribeMetadata.summary: Queries basic information about a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

DescribeNamespaceScopeSidecarConfig.title: DescribeNamespaceScopeSidecarConfig
DescribeNamespaceScopeSidecarConfig.summary: Queries the configurations of sidecar proxies at the namespace level.

DescribeNodesInstanceType.title: DescribeNodesInstanceType
DescribeNodesInstanceType.summary: Queries the instance types of nodes on the data plane and whether the instance types support Multi-Buffer acceleration.

DescribeReusableSlb.title: DescribeReusableSlb
DescribeReusableSlb.summary: Queries the Server Load Balancer (SLB) instances that can be reused.

DescribeServiceMeshAdditionalStatus.title: DescribeServiceMeshAdditionalStatus
DescribeServiceMeshAdditionalStatus.summary: Queries the check results of a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

DescribeServiceMeshClusters.title: DescribeServiceMeshClusters
DescribeServiceMeshClusters.summary: Queries the clusters that can be added to a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

DescribeServiceMeshDetail.title: DescribeServiceMeshDetail
DescribeServiceMeshDetail.summary: Queries the details of a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

DescribeServiceMeshKubeconfig.title: DescribeServiceMeshKubeconfig
DescribeServiceMeshKubeconfig.summary: Queries the content of the kubeconfig file of a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

DescribeServiceMeshLogs.title: DescribeServiceMeshLogs
DescribeServiceMeshLogs.summary: Queries the logs of a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

DescribeServiceMeshProxyStatus.title: DescribeServiceMeshProxyStatus
DescribeServiceMeshProxyStatus.summary: Queries the status of proxies on the data plane of a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

DescribeServiceMeshUpgradeStatus.title: DescribeServiceMeshUpgradeStatus
DescribeServiceMeshUpgradeStatus.summary: Queries the upgrade details of a Service Mesh (ASM) instance and its ingress gateways.

DescribeServiceMeshVMs.title: DescribeServiceMeshVMs
DescribeServiceMeshVMs.summary: Queries the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances that reside in the same virtual private cloud (VPC) as a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

DescribeUpgradeVersion.title: DescribeUpgradeVersion
DescribeUpgradeVersion.summary: Queries the update status of a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

DescribeUsersWithPermissions.title: DescribeUsersWithPermissions
DescribeUsersWithPermissions.summary: Queries the IDs of all RAM users or RAM roles to which a Role-based Access Control (RBAC) role is assigned.

DescribeVMsInServiceMesh.title: DescribeVMsInServiceMesh
DescribeVMsInServiceMesh.summary: Queries the virtual machines (VMs) that are added to a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

DescribeVSwitches.title: DescribeVSwitches
DescribeVSwitches.summary: Queries a list of vSwitches that are deployed in a specified virtual private cloud (VPC) in a region.

DescribeVersions.title: DescribeVersions
DescribeVersions.summary: Queries available Service Mesh (ASM) versions when you create an ASM instance.

DescribeVpcs.title: DescribeVpcs
DescribeVpcs.summary: Queries the virtual private clouds (VPCs) that are available in a specified region.

GetCaCert.title: GetCaCert
GetCaCert.summary: Obtains a certificate issued by a certificate authority (CA).

GetDeploymentBySelector.title: GetDeploymentBySelector
GetDeploymentBySelector.summary: Queries a list of workloads specified by a label selector.

GetGrafanaDashboardUrl.title: GetGrafanaDashboardUrl
GetGrafanaDashboardUrl.summary: Queries the Grafana dashboard URL from Application Real-Time Monitoring Service (ARMS).

GetRegisteredServiceEndpoints.title: GetRegisteredServiceEndpoints
GetRegisteredServiceEndpoints.summary: Queries the endpoints of a registered service in an Alibaba Cloud Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

GetRegisteredServiceNamespaces.title: GetRegisteredServiceNamespaces
GetRegisteredServiceNamespaces.summary: Queries the namespaces of a registered service in an Alibaba Cloud Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

GetSwimLaneDetail.title: GetSwimLaneDetail
GetSwimLaneDetail.summary: Queries detailed information about a lane.

GetSwimLaneGroupList.title: GetSwimLaneGroupList
GetSwimLaneGroupList.summary: Queries a list of all lane groups in an Alibaba Cloud Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

GetSwimLaneList.title: GetSwimLaneList
GetSwimLaneList.summary: Queries a list of all the lanes in a lane group.

GetVmAppMeshInfo.title: GetVmAppMeshInfo
GetVmAppMeshInfo.summary: Queries the information about VMs that are added to a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

GetVmMeta.title: GetVmMeta
GetVmMeta.summary: Queries the metadata that is required to add a non-containerized application to a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

GrantUserPermissions.title: GrantUserPermissions
GrantUserPermissions.summary: Grants permissions to a Resource Access Management (RAM) user.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries user tags on a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

ListWaypoints.title: ListWaypoints
ListWaypoints.summary: Queries the configurations of all waypoint proxies in a namespace of a cluster on the data plane.

ModifyApiServerEipResource.title: ModifyApiServerEipResource
ModifyApiServerEipResource.summary: Disassociates an elastic IP address (EIP) from an API server or associates an EIP with an API server.

ModifyServiceMeshName.title: ModifyServiceMeshName
ModifyServiceMeshName.summary: Modifies the name of a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

ReActivateAudit.title: ReActivateAudit
ReActivateAudit.summary: Recreates a project that is used to store audit logs. After mesh audit is enabled, if you delete the log project that stores audit logs by mistake, you can recreate a project for storing audit logs.

RemoveClusterFromServiceMesh.title: RemoveClusterFromServiceMesh
RemoveClusterFromServiceMesh.summary: Removes a cluster from a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

RemoveVMFromServiceMesh.title: RemoveVMFromServiceMesh
RemoveVMFromServiceMesh.summary: Removes a virtual machine (VM) from a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

RevokeKubeconfig.title: RevokeKubeconfig
RevokeKubeconfig.summary: Revokes the kubeconfig file of a Service Mesh (ASM) instance and generates a new kubeconfig file.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Adds or modifies user tags on a resource.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Deletes user tags on a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

UpdateASMGatewayImportedServices.title: UpdateASMGatewayImportedServices
UpdateASMGatewayImportedServices.summary: Updates imported services on a Service Mesh (ASM) gateway to import or delete upstream services associated with the gateway.

UpdateASMNamespaceFromGuestCluster.title: UpdateASMNamespaceFromGuestCluster
UpdateASMNamespaceFromGuestCluster.summary: Synchronizes namespaces of a Kubernetes cluster that is added to a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

UpdateControlPlaneLogConfig.title: UpdateControlPlaneLogConfig
UpdateControlPlaneLogConfig.summary: Modifies the configuration for collecting control plane logs.

UpdateGuestClusterConfig.title: UpdateGuestClusterConfig
UpdateGuestClusterConfig.summary: Updates the configuration of Guest Cluster

UpdateIstioGatewayRoutes.title: UpdateIstioGatewayRoutes
UpdateIstioGatewayRoutes.summary: Updates a routing rule for a Service Mesh (ASM) gateway.

UpdateIstioInjectionConfig.title: UpdateIstioInjectionConfig
UpdateIstioInjectionConfig.summary: Modifies the sidecar proxy injection settings of a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

UpdateIstioRouteAdditionalStatus.title: UpdateIstioRouteAdditionalStatus
UpdateIstioRouteAdditionalStatus.summary: Updates the information about a routing rule for a Service Mesh (ASM) gateway.

UpdateMeshCRAggregation.title: UpdateMeshCRAggregation
UpdateMeshCRAggregation.summary: Updates the settings of whether to enable the Kubernetes API on the data plane to access Istio resources.

UpdateMeshFeature.title: UpdateMeshFeature
UpdateMeshFeature.summary: Updates the configuration of a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

UpdateMeshMultiClusterNetwork.title: UpdateMeshMultiClusterNetwork
UpdateMeshMultiClusterNetwork.summary: Updates the network configurations of multiple Kubernetes clusters in a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.

UpdateNamespaceScopeSidecarConfig.title: UpdateNamespaceScopeSidecarConfig
UpdateNamespaceScopeSidecarConfig.summary: Updates the configurations of sidecar proxies at the namespace level.

UpdateSwimLane.title: UpdateSwimLane
UpdateSwimLane.summary: Updates the information about a lane.

UpdateSwimLaneGroup.title: UpdateSwimLaneGroup
UpdateSwimLaneGroup.summary: Updates the information of a lane group.

UpgradeMeshEditionPartially.title: UpgradeMeshEditionPartially
UpgradeMeshEditionPartially.summary: Upgrades a Service Mesh (ASM) instance to Professional Edition that is commercially released.

UpgradeMeshVersion.title: UpgradeMeshVersion
UpgradeMeshVersion.summary: Updates the version of a Service Mesh (ASM) instance.
